name: Rats and Traps
description:
This is the end result of a project taught by Ryan Laley Games. Its my first release, and is currently in alpha and is a work in progress. 2 levels are currently ready to test, with two more to follow.
I hope you enjoy the creation, also designed by my kids, and have some fun.

Set in a strange place with nothing but walls, magic ability's, traps and rats with some secrets hidden within. Where are you?  Who are you?  Maybe the answers lie within..... 

Updates

v0.0.16 - Fixed issue with options/Made visible backdrop as I forgot to enable it!/Added keyboard control menu/Various fixes/Added more pain/Extra rats ;)
